Text: WTF are you on about! Great Description .. I wanted it instantly!

...Whatever


Seriously, this January fucking SUCKED for flight sim. Aerosoft, FTX, PMDG, Level-D and pretty much every other big dev hasn't released anything new...and hardly any new torrents.
Yep I Want this too, You all need this it's really first class...By the way sosi...What is it?

so come on guys what is this like in fsx
to be honest with you ive never seen a UFO from the cockpit
This is proably some freeware stuff.. everyone is stil waiting for a cracked 707, the dream of many simmers.. but where are the good crackers in 2011?
they are all in the nick. or just that they say they can crack ?

All very good mentions.The thing to remember is though a 32bit pc is only max capable of 4GBS Max.But I believe to be better as of yet.The 64 bit gives you min 4 and up.The problem is how many cores because than your really into your CPU out put.Now you may have a nice chuck but if its quad core really than how much is it.

So what actually Im saying is. Depending on the cores and CPU outage is what makes and breaks the deal.Usually the best be is to have your PC tailored for your self, but in saying that for the 1 sim is very expensive don't kid your self. Now the easiest way I found around this is to pick where you usually fly.

So once you know that tailor your Sim to it.A couple of airport far of here and thier won't make that much of a dif.But once you load every aerosoft product known to man king your screwd.So pick wisesly.do you do long flight.short flights.do you do carriers.set up based upon these elements and youll run faster.Make sure to shut down non essentials while simming guys.Safe flying.
Jim you wouldn't see a UFO if it was siphoning gas from your plane ;P
